post.author: ThirteenValleys
post.title: The N-Word as Rules Lawyer Test

div.p: Deliberate autism test. Autism in the 4chan sense here. I'm only half-joking.

If someone goes "But clearly there's a distinction between a use and a reference and what's the philosophical justification for blah blah blah", they're probably going to be a pain in the ass Rules Lawyer in some other way. Someone who knows never to use the word under any circumstances is someone who can be relied on.
(You'd think that a law class would want to select for rules lawyers, not against them, but there you go.)
